messages.subject: RE: [nihontostudy] London NTHK Shinsa pics
messages.msgSnippet: Must be in trouble. Gordon ... From: Richard Turner [mailto:ikkanshi@westnet.com.au] Sent: Tuesday, October 07, 2003 3:36 PM To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
messages.messageBody:
Must be in trouble.




Gordon



-----Original Message-----
From: Richard Turner [mailto:ikkanshi@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 07, 2003 3:36 PM
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [nihontostudy] London NTHK Shinsa pics



Gordon, your photo has been in everything lately, what's going on.

Rich
----- Original Message -----
From: Gordon Robson
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, October 07, 2003 2:33 PM
Subject: RE: [nihontostudy] London NTHK Shinsa pics


Thanks Jim, good pictures.



Gordon



-----Original Message-----
From: Jim Gilbert [mailto:jggilbert@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 07, 2003 10:52 AM
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [nihontostudy] London NTHK Shinsa pics



I'm back...

I uploaded a few photos from the London shinsa to:

http://tinyurl.com/pyns

Graham Curtis (the fellow reclining in the first photo) and his team did a
fantastic job of organizing the event. The shinsa team was quite busy
with
many interesting items from the UK, the continent and beyond. It was nice
to meet the collectors "over there" after exchanging email over the years,
although unfortunately there was very little time to talk while the shinsa
was under way. If anyone has questions, please ask.

Jim
